summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. W-5, for the improvement of California Avenue, from the south line of Spruce Street to the northerly lien of Grant Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle (formerly West Seattle), by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 163 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
